document_data.name: Shadow priest
document_data.home:
[[Graveyard (Mere of Dead Men)|Unnamed graveyard]],
[[Mere of Dead Men]]
document_data.mainbody: This '''unnamed shadow priest''' was an antagonist of the [[Graveyard (Mere of Dead Men)|unnamed graveyard]] near the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.History: This shadow priest was located in the unnamed graveyard. He raised zombies and skeletons to boost [[Black Garius]]' army. He also captured [[Tann]] and his men. However, the Kalach-Cha was employed to investigate and defeat the shadow priest.
